text: (He paigambaracya donhi patninno!) Jara tumhi allahakade maphi magala (tara phara cangale ahe). Nihsansaya, tumaci hrdaye jhukali aheta ani jara tumhi paigambaracya virodhata ekamekanci madata karala tara nihsansaya, tyanca mitra sanraksaka allaha ahe ani jibrila neka imana rakhanare ani tyacyakherija pharistehi madata karanare aheta
